title: Custom Branding
custom_preconds:
Given the user has At Bat installed
and WBC is enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the WBC home
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the WBC section has a custom logo at the top

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the WBC home
custom_steps_separated.expected: The sections within the WBC section have a custom solid background color similar to a team view

title: Placement
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed

custom_steps_separated.content: and setup in the bottom nav
custom_steps_separated.expected: then WBC logo is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: and setup in the More Menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: then WBC logo is displayed

title: WBC Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone
and WBC is enabled
and there are WBC games
custom_steps: When a user navigates to the WBC home view

custom_steps_separated.content: WBC Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the WBC home view scoreboard will only show today's games
and it should account for international timezones
and for games that cross international date lines

custom_steps_separated.content:
WBC Scoreboard
when there are multiple games scheduled on that day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then each game cell on the WBC scoreboard will show the team names as their tri-code
and the following game information:
Preview: Teams, Start Time
Live: Teams, Score, Inning, On base, Count, Outs, Game Status
Final: Teams, Score, Final Indicator, other status indicators

custom_steps_separated.content:
WBC Scoreboard
when there are also exhibition games scheduled on that day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the WBC scoreboard will only include WBC games
(and no exhibition games)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WBC Scoreboard
when there is only one game scheduled on that day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there will only be one game cell at the top of the WBC scoreboard and it will show the following information:
Preview: Full Team Names, Start time, Team records, Probable pitchers with record & ERA, Pool/Series Status Note
Live: Team tri-code, Inning, Linescore, On base, Outs, Current Pitcher/Batter matchup, Game Status

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a WBC game cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken directly to Gameday for that game

title: Tournament Schedule
custom_preconds:
When a user is on an iPhone
and WBC has been enabled in the app
and there are WBC games scheduled
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the WBC Home View
custom_expected:
Then there will be a link to
Full Schedule
Schedule by Pool
which will be a webview

title: WBC News
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an iPhone
and WBC has been enabled in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the WBC home view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there will be a news carousel located under the scoreboard/schedule
with the top 5 WBC-related news articles, similar to the top stories on the team view

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a story in the news carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to that story in the context of the news index
and the user will be able to swipe through stories in the index

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a story in the news carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be able to read and share the news article
similar to any other news article within the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the "See All" link on top of the news carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the full WBC News index

title: WBC Video
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an iPhone
and WBC has been enabled in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the WBC home view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there will be a video carousel located under the news carousel
with the top 5 WBC-related videos, similar to the top stories on the team view

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a video in the carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video will play with full player controls

custom_steps_separated.content: When a LITE user taps on a video in the carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the lite user will see prerol

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the "See All" link on top of the video carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the full WBC Video index
and each video will have an option to share
and there will be a text search provided within the context of the WBC content

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches a video from the full WBC Video index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the videos will autoplay the next video once complete

title: More Section
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an iPhone
and WBC has been enabled in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the WBC home view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there will be a "More" section beneath the video section
and it will have subsections to divide content
and the links (webview or native) and text will be managed by Ops through homebase CMS

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user scrolls down to the "More" section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see webview links for the following:
Bracket
Pools/Venues
Teams/Rosters
Tickets
Stats

title: Sponsorship & Ads
custom_preconds:
Given the user has At Bat installed
and WBC has been enabled
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the WBC Home view
and the user is a LITE user

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPhone WBC Home view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
a 320x50 display adhesion banner will be displayed
and adhesion slots auto-rotate every 30 seconds

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPhone WBC Home view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
an inline 300x250 native slot after the video section with fallback to display
and inline slot will rotate each time a user scrolls the ad into view

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPad WBC Home view
custom_steps_separated.expected: Tablet will have portrait and landscape display banners (960x90 and 728x90)

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPhone WBC News
custom_steps_separated.expected: The News Index will have inline native ad slots at 300x250 that fallback to display similar to the team news index

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPhone WBC News Article
custom_steps_separated.expected: News Articles will have inline native ad slots at 300x250 that fallback to display

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPhone and iPad WBC News Article
custom_steps_separated.expected: News articles will show a full page ad when swiping between articles after every 3rd article similar to At Bat News

custom_steps_separated.content: on iPhone and iPad WBC
custom_steps_separated.expected: Ads are only shown to lite users only

title: Team Grid
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an iPhone
and WBC has been enabled in the app
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the WBC home view
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a grid with all the WBC teams
and tapping on a team will take the user to that team's WBC webview

title: Spanish Language
custom_preconds:
Given the device language is set to Spanish
and WBC has been enabled in the app
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the WBC home view
custom_expected:
Then the page will be properly displayed in Spanish
and will have Spanish News index
and will have Spanish Video index

title: WBC News Index
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and WBC is installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the At Bat News section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the MLB.com News index will be the default

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the news filter drop-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a "World Baseball Classic" filter listed right under the MLB.com Headlines filter

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the WBC News filter
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the full WBC News index

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the WBC News index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then that index's layout will be treated the same as any other team news index
and there should be icons for Chromecast, Audio, and Video in the action bar
and the hamburger menu should appear

custom_steps_separated.content: When the LITE user navs to the WBC News index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see native 300x250 ads displayed the same as the team news indices
(after first 3 articles, and then after every 5th article)
and a 320x50 banner ad

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a news article in the WBC news index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the news article page for the article they selected

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to an article page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Audio and Video icons should not appear in the action bar
And they should be replaced by "Text Resize" and "Share" buttons

And the hamburger menu should not appear
And the 'Up' button should appear

And the number of the article within the index along with the total number of articles in the index should appear in the action bar. (ie. 4 of 30)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes left or right on an article page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the article will transition to the next or previous article in the index
And the number on the action bar should update to reflect the number of the article in the index along with the total number of articles in the index
And the user should NOT be able to loop through the index. (Cannot swipe from article 1 to article 30)
And if the user changes the device orientation after swiping from one article to another they should remain on the same article

title: WBC Video Index
custom_preconds: Given WBC has been enabled in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the At Bat Video section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the MLB.com Video index will be the default

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the video filter drop-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a "World Baseball Classic" filter listed right under the MLB.com Headlines filter

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the WBC Video filter
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the full WBC Video index

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the WBC Video index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then that index's layout will be treated the same as any other team news index
and the hamburger menu should appear
and there should be a search icon in the action bar
and each video highlight will have info and share buttons, the video headline, duration, and date

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a video highlight in the WBC index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video highlight that was selected will play

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Lite user taps on a video highlight in the WBC index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video highlight will begin to play AFTER a preroll ad

title: Order for Games
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and there are WBC games scheduled
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the At Bat Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: Order of games (without favorite team set)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see games listed in chronological order
with WBC games mixed with MLB games

custom_steps_separated.content: Order of games (with favorite team(s) set)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see games listed in chronological order
with WBC games mixed with MLB games
and with the user's favorite team(s) at the top of the list - regardless of game time

title: Game Types
custom_preconds: Given there are WBC and spring training games scheduled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
and there are WBC games scheduled between two countries
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then both teams will have the WBC logo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
and there are exhibition games scheduled between a WBC team and an MLB team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the WBC team will have its default logo and the MLB team will have its team logo
and no flags on the Scoreboard

title: Time Zones
custom_preconds: Given there are WBC games scheduled
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the game times will be displayed in their local time (confirm)
and will not default to Eastern Time
and no time zone will be displayed

title: EPG
custom_preconds:
Given there are WBC games scheduled
and the games have TV feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the MLB.TV EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all available TV feeds listed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the MLB.TV EPG
and there are WBC games with live/archived TV feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the WBC games will be labeled as such, similar to how Game of the Day games are labeled

title: WBC MLB.TV Access
custom_preconds:
Given there are WBC games scheduled
and there are WBC MLB.TV feeds available
custom_steps: When the user attempts to launch a WBC MLB.TV feed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is logged in with a TV Premium account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the blackout check will occur
and if the user is authorized to watch 
then the stream will play without issue

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is NOT logged in with a TV Premium account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted with a WBC-specific paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user sees the WBC-specific paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see an option to link to the cable auth flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is authorized to view MLB Network
and logs in with their cable provider credentials
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the WBC stream will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is logged in with their cable credentials 
and can successfully view MLBN WBC streams
but are NOT MLB.TV subscribers
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they will only be able to stream WBC games
and NOT spring training games

title: Preview
custom_preconds: Given there are WBC games scheduled
custom_steps: When the user taps on a game in preview
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Gameday preview which will include the following information:
Game Info, Round, Venue and city, Pool, Game Time, Delayed-Reason
Probables
Lineups
Preview photo, headline, and blurb

title: Pitch by Pitch (PBP)
custom_preconds: Given there are WBC games scheduled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a WBC game in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to Gameday for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: "Live" tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then "gameday_sw" will be used to determine if the "Live" tab will be available
(if "N" then hide Live tab)

custom_steps_separated.content: Pitch FX
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then "gameday_sw" will be used to determine if Pitch FX will be available

custom_steps_separated.content: Gameday Backdrops (International Stadiums)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Gameday backdrop will be an image from that stadium

custom_steps_separated.content: Gameday backdrops (US Stadiums)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a custom WBC backdrop for that stadium will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Batters
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then country-based batters will be displayed
(generic with country flag on jersey)

title: Box
custom_preconds:
Given there are WBC games scheduled
and the user is viewing Gameday for a WBC game
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Gameday "Box" tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the linescore, batters, pitchers, and notes, with team subtabs for that game

title: Plays
custom_preconds:
Given there are WBC games scheduled
and the user is viewing Gameday for a WBC game
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Gameday "Plays" tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see Scoring Plays and Play by Play

title: Videos
custom_preconds: Given there are WBC games scheduled
custom_steps: When a user navigates to Gameday for a WBC game

custom_steps_separated.content: Live Game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then in-game video highlights will not be available

title: Player Cards
custom_preconds:
Given "World Baseball Classic" has been enabled in the app
and there are player card tokens for players in the WBC
custom_steps: When the user taps on one of the player card tokens within Gameday
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to a WBC-specific player card
(even if he is an MLB player; if he is currently playing for a WBC team, the player card must lead to a WBC page)

title: WBC News Channel
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the WBC is enabled
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the app settings

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a push notification channel titled "WBC News"
and it will be located

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user enables Notifications
and toggles ON the WBC News channel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be signed up to receive WBC News push notifications

title: WBC News Notifications
custom_preconds:
Given WBC is enabled in the app
and the user is subscribed to the WBC News push notification channel
custom_steps:
When the user receives a WBC News push notification to their device
and taps on the notification
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the WBC home section in the app
